General.Name: Tons Lightology
General.Description: Tons Lightology Inc., together with its subsidiaries, designs and manufactures commercial lighting products in Taiwan, rest of Asia, Europe, Oceania, and internationally. The company offers light-emitting diode, high-intensity discharge, fluorescent, and halogen lighting products. Its indoor lighting products include tracks and structures, luminaires for tracks, recessed downlights, frameless and adjustable downlights, assemblies, surface-mounted ceiling lights, pendant lights, wall lights, display spotlights, linear lights, task lights, and micro track lights. The company's outdoor lighting products comprise outdoor downlights, outdoor ceiling lights, outdoor wall lights, in-ground lights, projectors, flood lights, bollards, and outdoor accessories. Its products are used for architectural, retail display, residential, entertainment, outdoor area and commercial/industrial lighting applications. Tons Lightology Inc. was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
